name: nfl-analytics-database
description: Database-driven NFL analytics system with daily data sync

scripts.init-db: node -e "const db = require('./nfl-database-service.js'); const service = new db(); service.initialize().then(() => { console.log('Database initialized'); service.close(); });"
scripts.test-db: node -e "const db = require('./nfl-database-service.js'); const service = new db(); service.initialize().then(() => service.getTeams()).then(teams => { console.log('Teams:', teams.length); service.close(); });"

author: NFL Analytics System
